remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 C# 中，此属性是 类的索引器。In C#, this property is the indexer for the class. 在 JScript 中，您可以使用某个类型定义的默认索引属性，但不能显式定义自己的属性。In JScript, you can use the default indexed properties defined by a type, but you cannot explicitly define your own. 但是，在类上指定 expando 特性将自动提供其类型为 Object、索引类型为的默认索引属性 。However, specifying the expando attribute on a class automatically provides a default indexed property whose type is Object and whose index type is .

exception.span: 该索引小于 0（零）或大于此集合的大小。

span.span: The index is less than zero (0) or greater than the size of the collection.

span.span: Gets or sets the values of the collection.

value.span: 如果集合为空，则该属性值为 null引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: If the collection is empty, the property value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

value.span: 如果集合包含一个值，则属性值就是该值。

span.span: If the collection contains one value, the property value is that value.

value.span: 如果集合包含多个值，则属性值等于这些值的数组的副本。

span.span: If the collection contains multiple values, the property value equals a copy of an array of those values.

value.span: 如果设置此属性，则值将添加到 中。

span.span: If setting this property, the value or values are added to the .

value.span: 将该属性设置为 null引用 () 清除集合。

span.span: Setting this property to a null reference () clears the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要添加多个值，请将此属性设置为值的数组。To add multiple values, set this property to an array of the values.
